name: Book of light
description:
Change room atmosphere

Tired of your boring room? Don't worry, the Book Lamp has you covered. Simply plug it in and bring cozy library atmosphere to your room instantly.

Comfortable for eyes

The book lamp glows just enough to provide a gentle light for late-night reading. Pick between 8 different colors, and watch dimmed light enrich your space.

Perfect for rizzing

Your crush will love it, and as you both relax by the dimmed light, it will set chill romantic mood. Plus it's such a cute topic to talk about. Ps. Try kissing on red light.

name: Night book reader
description:
Read the book when it's the dark hour of the night, and never wake your partner up. Gaze through the books of power and fantasy in the dark hours, when nobody is awake. This is the true path to become feared.
Specification:
  • Size: 150x170x15mm
  • Material: ABS+Acrylic
  • Colour: Black
  • Power: Powered by 3 AAA batteries (not included)
  • High brightness and brightness can be adjusted.
  • Elegant style, easy to carry and comfortable to wear.
  • It's a whole new way of reading using light.
  • Portable and lightweight design.
  • A whole new way to read using light.
Due to manual measuring, please allow 1~3mm error,thank you.

name: Night reading dimmed lamp
description:
The message board lamp will give you ability to throw the light on one message. The one message, which will shine on your desk every day. Be careful what you write, as it can destroy you, or reborn you into a feared entity. One message, to shine though time.
Specification:
  • Material: Acrylic, LED, Electronic Component
  • Color:
    • Board: Tranparent
    • Base: White
    • Type: Blank, Calendar, Heart
    • Light Color: Warm
  • Size: Board: 10*15cm; Base: 9.7*4cm
  • Power Way: USB Input
  • Package Details:
    • 1pc x Acrylic Board
    • 1pc x Base
    • 1pc x Pen
  • Voltage: 5V 1A

name: Rabbit lamp
description:
Cute rabbit. He is just cute, not very useful. But, in the times of recovering energy before next attack, it can be source of joy, a beautiful thing to look at. Such a beauty can be a source of healing power. Let the rabbit lamp heal your wounds, and prepare for the next strike.
Specification:
  • Material: ABS+silicone
  • Rated voltage: 5V/0.3A
  • Rated power: 1W
  • Battery capacity: 1200 mAh 18650 battery
  • Charging time: 2-3H
  • Usage time: 6-8 hours
  • Package include:
    • Cute rabbit night light * 1
    • Charging cable * 1
    • Instruction manual * 1
  • Voltage: 5V 1A
